import'../App.css';import React,{useState}from"react";import{Link,useNavigate}from"react-router-dom";import axios from"axios";import{login}from'../store';import{useDispatch}from'react-redux';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Register=()=>{const[name,setName]=useState('');const[username,setUsername]=useState('');const[password,setPassword]=useState('');const navigate=useNavigate();const dispatch=useDispatch();const registerbutton=e=>{e.preventDefault();axios.get('https:localhost:3001/register',{name,username,password})// Update URL here
.then(res=>{if(res.data.status){localStorage.setItem('token',res.data.token);alert("Registration Completed");dispatch(login());navigate('/movies');}else{alert('Username already taken');}}).catch(err=>console.log(err));};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"register",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{className:"label",children:"Register"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:registerbutton,className:"form",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{className:"userlabel",children:"Name: "}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{className:"input",placeholder:"Name",type:"text"// Use type="text" for name
,onChange:e=>setName(e.target.value)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{className:"userlabel",children:"Username: "}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{className:"input",placeholder:"Username",type:"text"// Use type="text" for username
,onChange:e=>setUsername(e.target.value)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{children:"Password: "}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{className:"input",placeholder:"Password",type:"password",onChange:e=>setPassword(e.target.value)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",children:"Submit"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("h4",{children:["Have an account? ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/login",children:"Login"})]})]})]});};export default Register;
